Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Antimicrobial peptide 3 (XT-3; Levitide-like peptide; Frogs, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the gastrin/cholecystokinin family (Magainin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus;Gram-negative bacteria:E.coli (Combination with XT1 and XT6).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacterium S.aureus and Gram-negative bacterium E.coli, when in combination with XT1 and XT6.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides isolated from skin secretions of the diploid frog, Xenopus tropicalis (Pipidae).
Literature.Author: Ali MF, Soto A, Knoop FC, Conlon JM.
